message:
SYSTEM: FernandezM.Feb2019.pdf: Página 4
Introduction
Long experience in ontological engineering led the authors to the following
hypotheses:
Hypothesis 1
It may be that most of the ontologies do not reuse ontologies of their
same domain.
Authors’ belief in this hypothesis has been reinforced by the work
carried out by Kamdar and colleagues [Kamdar et al., 2017], focused
on BioPortal, which states, as one of their conclusions, that the reuse
among biomedical ontologies is quite limited.
